definition: to store/to save/to have in reserve/heir/Taiwan pr. [chu2]
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

sentences.english: Don't even think about the trillion-plus dollars in foreign exchange reserves.
sentences.chinese: 甚至不要再想那一万亿以上的外汇储备了。

sentences.english: The significance of the huge foreign-exchange reserves lies elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 巨额外汇储备的重大意义在于其它方面。

sentences.english: The government didn't have enough foreign currency to bail out the banks.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛政府也没有足够的外汇储备可以用来救助银行。

sentences.english: The accumulation accelerated in 2002. As the U.
sentences.chinese: 外汇储备的增长在2002年开始加速。

sentences.english: China's foreign exchange reserves have risen considerably.
sentences.chinese: 国家外汇储备大幅度增加。

sentences.english: China manages its reserves with considerable secrecy.
sentences.chinese: 中国于外汇储备经营之道一向讳莫如深。

sentences.english: Second, at present levels the reserves can pay for about a year and half's worth of China's imports.
sentences.chinese: 第二，中国的外汇储备量相当于一年半的进口总额。

sentences.english: And China needs a place to diversify its reserves, Mr. Song said.
sentences.chinese: 另外，宋先生说，中国需要欧洲来分散投资外汇储备。

sentences.english: This is the first time that any country's reserves have exceeded 10 digits.
sentences.chinese: 这是有史以来第一次一个国家的外汇储备超过十位数。

sentences.english: You want to know about the country's gold and foreign exchange reserves accumulation, flip to chapter five.
sentences.chinese: 你想知道中国的黄金及外汇储备，请浏览第五章。

sentences.english: And it would still have almost half of its reserves left over.
sentences.chinese: 而且这么做的话中国手里还能剩下一半的外汇储备。

sentences.english: The foreign-exchange reserves, then, represent no more than the asset side of a balance sheet, against which the central bank holds liabilities.
sentences.chinese: 因此，外汇储备不过是兑成了外币的央行负债而已。

sentences.english: Currently no large-scale repatriation of foreign exchange reserves and foreign exchange needs.
sentences.chinese: 目前我国外汇储备没有大规模调回并结汇的需要。

sentences.english: China's reserves are by far the largest in the world.
sentences.chinese: 中国的外汇储备量全球第一遥遥领先。

sentences.english: The Chinese government still has $711 billion in foreign currency reserves that need to be invested.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府目前有7110亿美元的外汇储备需要投资。

sentences.english: Brazil also eschews bringing risky assets into its reserves mix.
sentences.chinese: 巴西也避免将风险资产引入自己的外汇储备。

definition: local currency/our own currency/abbr. for 本位貨幣|本位货币
abbr. for various central banks, notably 中國人民銀行|中国人民银行[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Yin2 hang2] and 中央銀行|中央银行[Zhong1 yang1 Yin2 hang2]
